error.already_configured: This account name has already been used. Use re-configure.
error.error_authenticating: Error authenticating, token invalid, check log for errors
error.invalid_url: Error, the originating url does not seem to be a valid microsoft redirect
error.permissions: Minimum permissions not granted for account: {entity_name}
error.corrupted: Token file is corrupted after successful authentication, check log for file system errors
error.missing: Token file is missing after successful authentication, check log for file system errors
error.token_file_error: Token file retrieval error, check log for errors from O365. Ensure token has not expired and you are using secret value not secret id.

data.entity_name: Uniquely identifying name for the entities

data_description.shared_mailbox: Do not put your own email address in this box

user.description: Enter previously created Entra ID App Registration credentials

api_options.name: Advanced API options
api_options.description: Advanced options for country specific needs

data_description.country: Only use if you know you need it since your credentials will be sent to the selected api/country.

request_default.title: Authorization Required - {entity_name}
request_default.description:
Complete the configuration by clicking on the link and copying the returned url into this field afterwards and submit

[Link MS365 account]({auth_url}){failed_permissions}

request_alt.title: Authorization Required - {entity_name}
request_alt.description:
To link your MS365 account, click the link, login, and authorize:

[Link MS365 account]({auth_url}){failed_permissions}

data.name: Calendar friendly name
data.end_offset: Hours to offset the end time
data.start_offset: Hours to offset the start time
data.max_results: Max number of events to retrieve

corrupted.title: Re-authentication required - {domain} - {entity_name}
corrupted.description: The token file is corrupted. Please [Reconfigure]({url}) the integration and re-authenticate to re-create the token file.

expired.title: Re-authentication required - {domain} - {entity_name}
expired.description: The token has expired. Please [Reconfigure]({url}) the integration and re-authenticate to re-create the token file.

missing.title: Re-authentication required - {domain} - {entity_name}
missing.description: The token file is missing. Please [Reconfigure]({url}) the integration and re-authenticate to re-create the token file.

outdated.title: Re-authentication required - {domain} - {entity_name}
outdated.description: The token is outdated. Please delete the token, then [Reconfigure]({url}) the integration and re-authenticate to re-create the token file.

permissions.title: Re-authentication required - {domain} - {entity_name}
permissions.description: Permissions missing. Please [Reconfigure]({url}) the integration and re-authenticate to re-create the token file.
